page.title: 11Day in The Life(cont.)
page.content: She collects my son from school at 3.15 when he wearily demands food and T.V...fairly easy requests.William's principal leisure activity is swimming which involves a weekly training session.The daughter,Claire has a busy and long school day finishing at about 6.30.She enjoys a variety of sporting and musical pursuits in this time. I usually return to surgery at 2_3pm.for antenatal clinic,minor operations and immunisations.Afternoon appointments are from 4pm.to 6pm.with urgent cases seen after.Closing at 7pm.(postgraduate meetings permiting) I go home.William is usually in bed.I eat with my wife and Claire which is often the first time to relax. Everything stops for the 9 o'clock News.
